alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:56PM CDT until June 17 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Western Custer County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 956 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Durham to 4 miles northwest of Wheeler, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Cheyenne, Erick, Hammon, Canute, Leedey, Reydon, Sweetwater, Strong City, Texola, Foss Reservoir, Angora, Moorewood, Crawford, Roll, Durham, Berlin, and Dempsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills; Washita
